name: Songbird LTF
about: At Songbird Aviation of Colorado, we are a flying club dedicated to providing comprehensive and affordable flight instruction for light sport aircraft. Located in Greeley, Colorado, our program is designed to help you become a skilled and confident pilot. We limit our membership to ensure ample aircraft availability and minimal locked-out dates. Our facilities feature two-mile long runways, a modern and friendly terminal, and a restaurant. Our focus is on your satisfaction, offering hands-on flight instruction in a supportive and efficient learning environment. Join us to achieve your pilotâ€™s license quickly and confidently.
